title: Living Openly With HIV: 'We Could Be Those Role Models We Wish We Had'
teaser: William Brawner has been HIV-positive for most of his life. He kept his status a secret for years, even from friends and sexual partners. His life is the subject of a new documentary, "25 to Life."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
